metadata.title: CVE-2024-38632 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vfio/pci: fix potential memory leak in vfio_intx_enable() Ifvfio_irq_ctx_alloc() failed will lead to 'name' memory leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
